participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Active and adventurous, enjoys fitness and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. two dogs live with me.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and sociable, loves spending time outdoors and enjoys leisurely activities.
participant_2.background: i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i like to grill outdoors.

content.text: Hey! Do you have short hair? Because I do.
